Package com.goldsprite.magicdungeon.screens

Class ScreenManager

java.lang.Object
com.goldsprite.magicdungeon.screens.ScreenManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.badlogic.gdx.utils.Disposable
public class ScreenManager extends Object implements com.badlogic.gdx.utils.Disposable
使用： * 创建: * * 实例化: ScreenManager.getInstance().addScreen(new YourScreen()).setLaunchScreen(YourScreen.class); * * 渲染: ScreenManager.getInstance().render(); * * 重大小: ScreenManager.getInstance().resize(width, height); * * 回收: ScreenManager.getInstance().dispose(); * 切换屏幕: * * 首先需要已添加目标屏幕，然后在屏幕内部使用getScreenManager().setCurScreen(TargetScreen.class) * 返回上次屏幕: * * 在屏幕历史堆栈有屏幕时getScreenManager().popLastScreen()来返回上个屏幕
